featuredServiceProviders.name: Moldlab
featuredServiceProviders.description: Mold identification, mold test kits and testing supplies. If you suspect you have a mold problem give us a call toll free and we can walk you through your testing options.

sampleReview.text: Their assessment was just what the mold removing company need to plan their work.

featuredServiceProviders.name: Environmental Air Solutions, Inc.
featuredServiceProviders.description: We offer a wide range of dependable services, such as air testing and mold control. With experienced and professional air quality consultants, you can count on us to make the air you breathe healthier and safer.

sampleReview.text: Arrived at property at agreed upon time and immediately went to work gathering samples.  Explained the process as he worked, great job!

featuredServiceProviders.name: COLLINS CLEANING SYSTEMS
featuredServiceProviders.description: Will bill Insurance companies on filed insurance claims for water, sewer backup, fire and smoke and mold remediation claims. Have trained and certified employees. We are a bonded and insured company. We take cash, check and credit cards payments.

sampleReview.text: It was really good and I told them that the price I paid was what I'm willing to pay. He came in and did an estimate. He was very conscientious and we have cats and dogs and he's very good about walking. You don't have to point to the little spots and it was just a pleasant experience. He actually wanted to do a good job. I really like that guy too.

featuredServiceProviders.name: Global Plasma Solutions
featuredServiceProviders.description: Global Plasma Solutions is a manufacturing company that sells air purification systems primarily into the commercial and residential markets.  Home owners can benenfit from our systems as they are easily adapted to any HVAC system.  Go to www.gpshvac.com to find a certified contractor near you to have one installed within your home.

sampleReview.text: The owner helped us with understanding this new ionizer technology and had to be contacted again about placing them in a better place in the HVAC system to increase ion output into the living space.  The ionizers are a bit pricey for such small units.  They help to kill germs in the home and remove new house construction VOCS, but we were disappointed that they did not remove all of the fumes. One email was not returned, but overall we had a good experience.

featuredServiceProviders.name: PuroClean Disaster First Response
featuredServiceProviders.description: Local Expert Water, Fire, Smoke and Mold Restoration in Fayetteville, North Carolina. Call for fast, local 24x7 response.

sampleReview.text: Great company and it was very easy working with this staff, led by Mark. This process has been very over whelming for me, but every question that I asked got an answer. I have been dealing with a lot of business getting my house back together but PuroClean's leadership Team is completely in touch with the business. This is by far the most employee friendly company that I have worked in. Professional, hard working, top notch group..

featuredServiceProviders.name: Environmental Testing & Research Laboratories, Inc
featuredServiceProviders.description: ETR Laboratories in an analytic laboratory with a broad range of commercial, industrial and individual clients. We provide analytic services using a wide variety of scientific methods including GC/MS, IC/MS, GIR, NMR and SEM equipment. We can do particle analysis, organic and inorganic chemical analysis and micro analysis on biological and other materials. Private water analysis is our specialty. Award winning. Additional DBA - Environmental Testing & Research Laboratories Inc, ETR Labs, ETR ...

sampleReview.text: The testing process was easy. Clear instructions were included with the test kit. The results gave me peace of mind.

teasers.title: Break the Mold: Why You Should Hire Separate Mold Testing and Mold Remediation Companies
teasers.description: There's an excellent reason why you should avoid going with the same company for mold testing and mold remediation. Learn why different companies should handle these tasks.

content.value: Avoid a conflict of interest by having different companies test and remediate your mold problem

teasers.title: Testing for Home Health Hazards
teasers.description: Mold, radon, carbon monoxide and asbestos are dangerous health hazards to occupants in any home. Learn how to test for these problems yourself.

image.altText: home health hazard inspector hanging a warning sign on a door

content.value: Mold, radon, carbon monoxide, asbestos — learn how to test for these problems at home.
